pageProduct.name: Sukin Signature Hydrating Mist Toner 125ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Our alcohol-free, Signature Hydrating Mist Toner combines Chamomile and Rosewater to help soothe, purify and cool tired skin. It can be used after cleansing, after make-up application or any time your skin is feeling tired, stressed or overheated. Perfect for hot days!

Warnings

e.g. Avoid contact with the eyes and rinse immediately if contact occurs. If irritation occurs rinse immediately and discontinue use. For external use only.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Rosa Damascena Flower Water (Rose), Glycerin, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract (Chamomile), Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol

Directions

Close eyes and spray onto face and neck area for an instant refreshing feel. Can be used on face and body, over and under lotions, creams, oils, gels and make-up. Use throughout the day to refresh and hydrate dry skin
